name: Simple Pasta Recipe
steps: Bring a large pot of water to boil and add salt.
Add pasta to the boiling water and cook for 8-10 minutes until al dente.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and saut√© for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with garlic.
Toss the pasta with the garlic oil and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot with grated parmesan cheese on top.
